back-to-eighteenreborn-as-the-scheming-w.title: Back to Eighteen：Reborn as the Scheming Wife
back-to-eighteenreborn-as-the-scheming-w.author: Unknown Author
back-to-eighteenreborn-as-the-scheming-w.description: In 1985, reborn Luna seizes her college acceptance letter moments before her family's sabotage. With icy resolve, she exposes their scheme to steal her future and force a marriage, wielding the envelope as both shield and blade. One snatched paper ignites a war against fate's chains.
